row.subject: Formosa - 1.25 Million
row.content:
M1.1. John -
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. Global Markets is maintaining that there are "accounting issues" with the $1.25 million.
[Inform: Global Markets claims there are "accounting issues" with a large amount of money, which Jeffrey doesn't believe]
Sflink1.2
M1.3. Should we get Faith Killen or Wes to get this wrapped up?
[Request-Information: should they get Faith Killen or Wes to fix the problem]
Flink1.3

row.subject: Formosa - 1.25 Million
row.content:
M2.1. There are no accounting issues.
[Inform: there are no accounting issues]
Blink1.2
Sflink2.1
M2.2. I am assuming that Nowlan is retrading the deal.
[Inform: Jean assumes that Nowlan is retrading the deal]
M2.3. I will set up a meeting with Wes.
[Inform: Jean will set up a meeting with Wes]
Blink1.3

row.subject: Formosa - 1.25 Million
row.content:
M3.1. This is bizzare.
[Inform: this is bizarre]
M3.2. Global Markets promised Jean this money and won't seem to write her a check.
[Inform: Global Markets promised Jean the money and won't write her a check]
Blink1.2
Sflink3.2
M3.3. It was also a low number relative to what was created for GM.
[Inform: this was a low number relative to what was created for Global Markets]
M3.4. John
[Conventional: signature]

row.subject: Formosa - 1.25 Million
row.content:
M4.1. I am told that this money should come this week.
[Inform: money should arrive this week]
Blink3.2

row.subject: Update - Formosa - 1.25 Million
row.content:
M5.1. Jean/ John -
[Conventional: salutation]
M5.2. It looks like they have fixed their "problems" and we should be getting our money through accounting tonight.
[Inform: so-called problems seem to be fixed, and money should arrive tonight]
Blink2.1
M5.3. Jean -
[Conventional: salutation]
M5.4. Can you make sure that Carol is talking to Greg Whiting in Gas Accounting? [Y]
[Request-Action: make sure Carol talks to Greg Whiting in Gas Accounting]
Flink5.4
M5.5. Thanks
[Conventional: thanks]
